title: 08/30/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 08/30/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin takes a look at the 49ers preparing to contend for another Super Bowl but wonders how they are going to manage their QB room with rookie Trey Lance looking like a potential superstar. He explains why it’s obvious the Miami Dolphins aren’t sold on Tua Tagovailoa being their franchise star after reports surfaced they are looking at a potential trade for Deshaun Watson. Colin tells you why he was right about Drew Lock and wrong about the Cowboys. Plus, Rams All Pro OL Andrew Whitworth joins the show to describe what he’s seen from his new QB Matt Stafford.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
